content:
TV shopping doesn't particularly appeal to me,
unless they're featuring the latest telescopes, or books on mysticism,
or... well, I suppose I am a tiny bit excited about it.
info: 幻雪电视购物闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I wonder what new items will appear
on the shopping channel today...
How mysterious~.
info: 幻雪电视购物闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Yeep~ The items available for TV shopping change every day,
It feels quite novel,
Like unwrapping a mysterious Gift Box each day!
